So, I watched the trailer for equestria girls.

I am rather confused...

I'm wondering if there are any fanfics of the Ponies finally making it to space, does anyone know? Not the first encounter type of thing where aliens (humans or otherwise) find them, I mean them actually having a technology leap and make it to space.

Our First Steps is exactly what you asked for. As a bonus, their program has a degree of haphazardness that will be most familiar to anyone on this forum.
